Argument Flip

Can you steelman the other side?

The Practice

Most people attack the weakest version of opposing arguments (strawmanning). Intellectual honesty requires the opposite: steelmanning— restating the other side better than its proponents would.

Why it matters: You can't truly hold a belief unless you understand the best case against it.

Perspective-Taking
See through other's eyes
Intellectual Honesty
No strawmen allowed

How it works

  1. 1State a belief you hold strongly
  2. 2Read the AI-generated counter-argument (best possible case against)
  3. 3Restate it fairly—no weakening, no strawmen
  4. 4Get scored on charity + accuracy
